moves.1. e4: My first ever mini-tourney so I decided to play it safe and stick with what I know. Which is e4 openings
moves.1... d5: I was very happy this was the opening my opponent decided to play in my first tourney game. I believe center counter is a very weak opening
moves.4. d4 e6 5. Nf3: I wondered by the Most common move on GK was Ne4 and so I played Nf3 because I thought it was stronger
moves.6. Bd2 Bxc3 7. Bxc3 Ne7 8. Bd3: I saw the chance of a classic bishop sacrifice
moves.10. Bd3 b6 11. Ng5: I saw the chance of 12. Qh5+ Kg8 13.Qh7# but this plan was thwarted.
moves.11... g6: This stopped it but I went back to plan B
moves.12. Qf3 Qd5: This stopped 14. Qh3+ Kg7 15. d5+ Kg8 16. Qh7#
moves.13. Qh3+: I had conceived of a new combo
moves.13... Kg7 14. Qh7+ Kf6 15. Ne4+ Kf5: 15.Qe4 would have made it last longer
moves.16. Qh3+ Kf4 17. Qf3#:
My combo worked

Lessons learned

1.) Center counter is very weak
2.)Not accepting the classic bishop sacrifice can make the game last longer in some circumstances
